trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Baltimore
There were no other sightings in Baltimore on or around October 7th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 6pm I was outside with my dog and talking to my neighbor, I pointed up and could see two very bright looking stars about 5 inches apart from one another in the sky. I said to him, look those aircrafts are flying very close to one another by the time I could show him they were gone. At first I thought it might be the sun catching an airplane but couldn't figure out why they were flying so close together. I ran in and told my family.... Later on about 2 hours later I took the dog for a walk, as I turned onto Marybeth I saw two stars very close together in the night sky. I said to myself, "no **** sherlock, you saw stars earlier!" As I laughed both Stars disappeared pretty darn fast. What the heck was that???? I also realized that it would have been impossible for those two stars to be in that position because earlier they were SW and now they were SE! Again I told the family but they weren't there so who knows really what I did see? Came on this sight to see if anyone else saw what I did?
